title: Jeb：生物群系数量将加倍？
author: seraph0012
txt_content:
本帖最后由 seraph0012 于 2013-8-17 11:09 编辑 

R B ‏@ciab7251
jeb你能告诉我们大概会有多少新的生物群系吗？比如1-3个，4-6个之类的。（@jeb_Could you give us an estimate on how many new biomes there will be?  Like, between 1-3, 4-6, etc.）

Jens Bergensten @jeb_
那要看你怎么计算“新的”生物群系了。除了全新的生物群系，现有的生物群系也将会有改变。所以。数量大概是现在的两倍？
（@ciab7251It depends on how you count. In addition to completely new ones, the old ones have new variations too. So, double?）
